text: What if every time (perhaps with a view enabled,) member(s) of a collective increased their movement above a threshold considered “workout” their color(s) showed up on your movement stream. This provides more variable feedback, intrinsic motivation bit and is a bit voyeuristic but in the best way and without privacy  concerns. (FADE IN you wake up to your alarm and see your stream wake up to. Then peaking out from the left of the screen Megan’s representation of movement is peaking out. You zoom out a bit and see she’s already put in her workout for the am. This motivates Sara to get out of bed) ?? *saving thought for tomorrow
.. And as you move along the ttc (?? Curve, the color of your movement stream could change color? Colors of collective members stay the same :)

attachments.title: The Limits of Friendship - The New Yorker
attachments.text: How does the increased prevalence of Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram in our lives affect our social circles?
attachments.fallback: The New Yorker: The Limits of Friendship - The New Yorker
